sappu ha karyala sewaka panatha 17 niyamanaya yatathe sewayojakaya watup warthawak thaba ganima awashya wana athara, ehi pahatha thorathuru athulath wiya yuthuya: sewaniyukthikayage nama; wayasa; sthri purusha bhawaya; panthiya ho shreniya, kumana ho; kotasa ho thanathura saha rakiyawa; wethana kala simawa (masika, sathi dekakata ho sathiyakata warak); mema wethana kala simawa thula rajakari kala paya sankhyawa; mema wethana kala simawa thula athikala rajakari kala paya sankhyawa; gewiya yuthu wethana anupathaya; gewiya yuthu dimana (ema ek ek dimanawan wen washayen penwamin); wethana kala simawa upaya athi dala watupa; dala watupen kala siyaluma kapaharim (ema ek ek kapaharim wen washayen penwamin); wethana kala simawa thula watupa matha sidukala siyaluma aththikaram; wethana kala simawa sambandhawa oonama wishramika ho duradarshi aramudalak wetha piliwelin sewayojakaya saha sewaniyukthikaya wisin sidukala dayakathwayan; ek ek wethana kala simawa sambandhayen gewana lada mulu athikala wethanaya; aadayam badu aagnya panatha ho wenath oonama likhitha nithiyak ho adhikarana anawum yatathe upaya athi mudala; shuddha wethanaya labunu bawata sakshi sandaha sewa niyukthikayage piligath kuwithansiya.
